[#fbconf-env-isc-user]
= `ISC_USER`

Default user for a connection.

.Configuration
Client

The value of `ISC_USER` is used by _fbclient_ as the default value for `isc_dpb_user_name` and `isc_spb_user_name` when no explicit username was set and `isc_dpb_trusted_auth`/`isc_spb_trusted_auth` is not included.

.See also
<<fbconf-env-isc-password>>
